text: Project 56 is a downloadable demo album. It is from the Canadian progressive house artist deadmau5. He has said on the networking website Myspace that "The idea back then was to do a thing called Project 56 which was 56 tracks for people with short attention spans. Instead of waiting years to finally throw it together, I figured I'd just toss it to everyone."http://blogs.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=blog.view&friendID;=4809789&blogID;=359275953 == Track listing == This album includes some tracks (be it or not in variant form) and elements that appear on the album Get Scraped. == References == == Other websites == *Project 56 at Discogs Category:2008 albums Category:Deadmau5 albums
title: Project 56 (album)
